headline.main: Trump Signs Revised Travel Ban Order, Leaves Iraq Off
headline.print_headline: Trump Signs Revised Travel Ban Order, Leaves Iraq Off

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump signed a revised executive order on Monday banning citizens from six Muslim-majority nations from traveling to the United States but removing Iraq from the list, after his controversial first attempt was blocked in the courts.
snippet: President Donald Trump signed a revised executive order on Monday banning citizens from six Muslim-majority nations from traveling to the United States but removing Iraq from the list, after his controversial first attempt was blocked in the court...
